metadata.title: CVE-2018-3836 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable command injection vulnerability exists in thegplotMakeOutput function of Leptonica 1.74.4. A specially crafted gplotrootname argument can cause a command injection resulting in arbitrary codeexecution. An attacker can provide a malicious path as input to anapplication that passes attacker data to this function to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: leptonlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
